nodes.label: message
nodes.text: Hi Person1, I am sorry to hear that this has not recovered. By this point, after two years, it the nerve has not recovered then I think it is unlikely that it will resolve. It is appropriate to consider surgery for the eyelid at this point. I am available to discuss further if you would like. This type of surgery  usually has the best results when done by an oculoplastic surgeon and I can make suggestions if that would be helpful.
